Anejo Old Fashioned

tequila

Ingredients

  • 2 oz anajo tequila
  • 1/2 oz agave nectar
  • 2 dashes angostura bitters

Procedure

  1. Pour inredients into mixing glass with ice
  2. Stir until chilled
  3. Strain into glass with an ice cube
